alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:00PM EDT until March 31 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Somerset County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from New Enterprise to near La Vale, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bedford, Clearville, New Enterprise, Everett, Osterburg, Buffalo Mills, St. Clairsville, Lake Gordon, Cessna, Hyndman, Schellsburg and Manns Choice. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 126 to 158. Interstate 99 from mile markers 0 to 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
